name: Get-IISSite
commandPattern: Import-Module WebAdministration; Get-IISSite | Select-Object Name, Id, State, @{Name='Bindings';Expression={$_.Bindings.Protocol + '://' + $_.Bindings.BindingInformation}}, @{Name='AppPool';Expression={(Get-ItemProperty "IIS:\Sites\$($_.Name)" -Name applicationPool).Value}} | Format-Table -AutoSize
